评论概述: The color is better than you think it’s going to be.
评论详情: It fits cute and is adorable.

I had purchased a similar style shirt from the same company I liked the more open next of this style so I went ahead and purchased the same size as the other style. The chest and torso have less of a circuiting the other style making the shirt tighter than I would have preferred.

评论概述: It fit and looks exactly like the photos
评论详情: I'll try to circle back here and add a photo one day. In the meantime, I was happily surprised by the quality and fit. I've ordered 10 different blouses from other companies and legit returned each one. Ordering clothes on Amazon is such a gamble and so frustrating sometimes. This blouse is the only one that looks exactly as you see it pictured and the only one I've kept. I ordered a medium and it is exactly a medium. I'm 5'6 and 157. If you are a little heavier you might want to go up. I don't have inches and inches of room all over.  The cut is feminine and the fabric soft, to me. I like it.

This is a cute shirt, but in the light blue color it looks like a shirt for a much younger woman than me.  If I had chosen one of the darker colors, I don't think I would have this issue, but the baby blue just doesn't work for me.  However, there are other colors to choose from and you might not have this issue with the same color.  The details on the shirt are cute and it fits well so it might be an option for others out there even though it didn't work for me.
get so many compliments on this top. good length!

Very dressy, nice looking top, but has absolutely no stretch.  This fabric is tight in places that I like to have a little stretch (like the chest).  It is very pretty but for me not very comfortable.
This shirt is very light weight, super well-fit, and very comfy.  For the most part, it's also well-made, although it does have some obvious flaws in seaming, mostly aesthetic in nature.
This shirt looked really cute on the model and I thought I would like it but I feel it adds 10+ years to my age lol. The fit is fine and the color is pretty but I just don't like how it looks on me.
Adorable and comfortable top!  So cute with jeans!

This is a really cute top and I get compliments every time I wear it.  Once I finally got the wrinkles out from when it was vacuum packed, it has not wrinkled again.  It washes well.  It is very comfortable and I really like the style and fit.  I love the feminine detailing and the green color is really nice.  This is a great casual, every day shirt.
The soft baby blue color is so pretty and the details in the shirt make it so dressy or casual. It fits true to size and it’s very comfortable and loose fitting.

I absolutely love this top. I’m not sure why others find this shirt uncomfortable. It’s soft and not see-through so I don’t have to layer it like I typically have to with this kind of material. It is cute worn out or tucked in. I wore it and got compliments. I love this blouse!

Really liked this shirt overall. It is a touch on the sheer side, so I ended up having to wear a tank top underneath it. It was generally true to size and was on the flowy side, so if you are in between sizes I would recommend sizing down (unless you prefer an oversized fit). The shirt is lightweight and comfortable and very cute overall. I was also pleasantly surprised that the material was not scratchy feeling, which I was a bit nervous about.
Well made of quality materials. Fits true to size.
Shirt runs a little wide and very long (I'm 4' 11")  but the material is nice. Will work well with a pair of jeans if you tuck.

评论概述: Lovely summer blouse, be careful with sizing
评论详情: This is a lovely blouse. I wear a small and found this fit well. I would warn though that unlike other garments it isn’t very stretchy and it would be easy to get the wrong size. So be careful with sizing as there isn’t a lot of give especially around the shoulder area. The fabric is nice and light. Great for summer wear. I love the cut. It is super feminine and pretty. It does come in a vacuum packed bag and when just pulling it out of the bag there are wrinkles. My picture is of it before getting rid of the wrinkles. Overall, I am happy with this blouse.

OMG, this top is fabulous!! I love everything about it: gorgeous blue color, little nubbies on the fabric, the fluttery sleeves. I got three or four compliments the first time I wore it. Washes like a dream! If everything I ordered from Amazon pleased me as much as this top did, I’d go broke ordering!!

So cute, light, flattering, and summery! The fabric has a Swiss dot embroidery pattern all over. The top is cut generously overall. I'm between a women's S/M right now and ordered this in a Small, and that was the right move. The ONLY thing I wish were different about this top is that it's 100% polyester and I wish it were 100% cotton instead.

I really like this shirt; it has lots of cute, feminine details. It was vacuum sealed, thus quite wrinkly upon opening. But I always wash new clothes before wearing, and after washing and drying I did not need to iron the shirt. I usually wear a Medium, which is what I got, and it’s a bit of an oversize fit. I got the light blue and the color was exactly what I expected. The fabric is not too thin or see through- which is a bonus so I don’t have to wear another shirt underneath. Recommend!
I have worn this to various places and received many compliments on it. It fits good and is very comfortable. I feel dressed up without having to worry about getting it messed up somehow. Love it!
The material is fairly sheer and requires an under shirt if you prefer to be more modest. It’s a nicely made blouse and can be dressed up or down depending on the event.
This runs a little on the bigger side, just a little though. It’s very cute and comfortable. It’s not too thick or thin of a material. I was worried that you’d be able to see through it but you can’t

I like all of the special touches on this little blouse and think it looks nicely made. I usually wear a medium in t-shirts and this size small is plenty roomy for me. It must be a 6-8 size. I'm 34D and about 130 lbs. It falls to about hip height on me.
This is a really pretty blouse. The embroidered placket and double sleeves add interest, as does the swiss dot fabric. It washes well and fits true to listed size. Very happy with it.

评论概述: Cute Top, But Fabric Not Soft
评论详情: This is a cute top, but the fabric texture is too rough.  The fit is exactly as expected.  I will wash the shirt a few times to see if it softens up.  I think it will need to be steamed even after washing because there are so many deep wrinkles from the vacuum packaging that it came in.  I will wear it whether or not it softens up, but I would really love the top if it was soft and comfy.Update:  After machine washing this top on permanent press Cold and drying on Low, it is somewhat softer.  It may continue to soften with additional washes.  The wrinkles didn't come out in the wash as I suspected, so I still need to steam them out before wearing.
This shirt is great quality and looks so cute! Great to look out together without dressing up. Nice weight material and a good price!

评论概述: Cute black blouse, fits great, HOWEVER …
评论详情: This blouse was packaged and shipped in a clear vacuum-sealed bag. Until I opened it up I couldn’t figure out what it was! Kudos for space saving ingenuity!  The blouse itself is really cute and it fit great! Those two features earned the two stars.  Aside from its good points, I can’t rate it any higher. I tried it on and took it off. A few hours later I had an itchy neck that got worse overnight, but I didn’t connect the itch to the blouse right away. I was going to toss the black blouse in with a load of dark clothes, but first, I picked up the packaging to throw it away. I was surprised to see a distinct pattern that had transferred from the dye in the blouse onto the white cardboard. That’s some strong dye!  Meanwhile, my neck had become so itchy and red that I had to start an antihistamine along with the RX cream I had begun applying during the night.  Whatever chemical or additive is in the fabric is not worth taking a chance it will contaminate the washing machine or other clothes. I can’t even think about wearing this blouse without wondering if all of the ‘whatever caused the rash’ is completely out of it. Sadly, I am tossing it in the trash.  I cannot recommend this item as is. :(
